初遇.encontent:
Y'all wanna fries, burgers, or apple Martini?The party's
 gonna begin, sit tight ... my naughty guest!
初遇.content:
想先来点薯条、汉堡，还是一杯苹果马汀尼？俱乐部狂欢
即将开始，坐稳扶好——我调皮的客人！

箱中气候.encontent:
... Ha! What a fresh air!Rains help corps grow better.
 I love raining!Let's fixin' out and have a walk!
箱中气候.content:
呼……哈！空气真好！好的雨水能让农作物长得更好，我
喜欢下雨！让我们一起出去散步吧！

致未来.encontent:
I hope one day people can accept my job just like they can do
 to the farmers and the dove keepers.Mammy would lemme lay on
 her knees and listen to all the stuff that happened today,no
 matter good or bad.
致未来.content:
我想有一天，大家接受我的工作就像是接受农夫与养鸽女
的劳作。妈咪也会让我躺在她的膝盖上，告诉她我遇到的
所有事。好的和不好的，我都想说给她听。

孑立.encontent:
Welcome!No no no it's a bit faster, and more energetic
 ...
孑立.content:
欢迎光临！不不不，是这样的，应该再说得快一些，再有
活力一些，呼……

问候.content: 咦？我的手帕放到哪里去了？

朝晨.encontent: Good morning, good morning, good morning!

信任-朝晨.encontent: Who wants some Bunny Bunny yummy brekker?
信任-朝晨.content: 谁想要芭妮芭妮掌勺的美味早餐——？

夜暮.encontent:
Hi, it's club time! You wanna grab a drink?Don't worry,
 we have 143 different choices here!
夜暮.content:
嗨，俱乐部时间！你也想来一杯吗？别担心，我们有143种
供应酒水可以选！

信任-夜暮.encontent:
Hey! How about malt beer?Don't worry if you get drunk,
 you can always count on Bunny Bunny. Always!
信任-夜暮.content:
来吧！来杯麦芽酒吧？喝醉了也没关系！可以依靠芭妮芭
妮～一切都可以～

帽檐与发鬓.encontent:
Oh, hey! Mama ain't no like a droopy girl!Help me get
 it up, hurry!
帽檐与发鬓.content:
噢，嘿——！兔妈妈不会喜欢垂耳朵的姑娘。快帮我竖起
来，快呀～！

袖与手.encontent:
I can hold you with a single arm.If you don't feel
 so good, just call me, dear guest!
袖与手.content:
我可以只用一只手就把你抱起来！如果身体不舒服就尽情
呼唤我吧，客人！

衣着与身形.encontent: Whoa, haha ... sorry, it's my belly ...
衣着与身形.content: 哇、哈哈……不好意思，是我的肚子在叫……

嗜好.encontent:
I sure like so many things ... I really, really can't
 pick one!You see, I like my job, I like yummy foods,
 I like everyone, and I like you!
嗜好.content:
我喜欢的东西太多了——我真的、真的选不出来！你看，我
喜欢工作，也喜欢好吃的东西。我喜欢大家，也喜欢你！

赞赏.encontent:
How I wanna clap for you! ... Hmm, when I got a free
 hand, I sure gonna do it!
赞赏.content:
我真想为你鼓掌！……嗯嗯嗯——等我腾出手来，我一定
要为你鼓掌！

亲昵.encontent:
Could you help me fix the zip on my back? Something's
 wrong there.Really? If Mama knows I'll be darned!
亲昵.content:
你能帮我整理一下背后的拉链吗？它似乎有点错位了。真
的吗？如果被兔妈妈发现就糟糕了！

闲谈Ⅰ.encontent: I can lift anyone with no sweat, except myself!
闲谈Ⅰ.content: 我能够轻而易举地举起任何一个人，我自己不算！

闲谈Ⅱ.encontent:
Alright! At least I done learnt this time,I ain't walk
 by that dessert store no more, nor the restaurant!
闲谈Ⅱ.content:
好吧！至少这一次我已经学聪明了！我不会再路过那家甜
品店，也会绕开上次的餐厅！

独白.encontent:
Back in the village, only my auntie talks about movies with me.She'd
 listened to all my faraway and impractical dreams.I sure am
 grateful to her. I write her all the time.And her writing back
 always smells like apple flower.
独白.content:
在乡村里，会与我讨论电影的只有姑妈。她倾听了我所有
遥远和不切实际的梦。我很感谢她，我总是给她写信。而
她的回信总是带着苹果花的味道。

入队.encontent: Howdy, howdy, howdy! Howdy to everyone!
入队.content: 你好，你好，你好，每个人都好！

战前.encontent: Hi! Would you like a fruit cut first?
战前.content: 您好，想先来一份水果拼盘吗？

择选至终的仪式.content: 小家伙们，躲到我身后来！

召唤至终的仪式.encontent:
Hey hoo ... Whoa whoa whoa! Whew, are you ready to
 have a hearty meal!
召唤至终的仪式.content: 嘿哟嘿哟……啊哇哇哇！呼～准备好饱餐一顿了吗！

战斗胜利.encontent: Bad guys are all gone, no worries!
战斗胜利.content: 坏人已经全都赶跑了，大家放心吧！

洞悉.encontent:
Unbelievable! You don't think ... I can lift a car?We
 ... we might could go out and try ...?
洞悉.content:
真是不可思议！你觉得……我能举起轿车吗？我们，我们
……是不是该出去试试？

洞悉之底.encontent: Really? Oh ... Really! I done loved it, thank you!
洞悉之底.content:
真的吗？哇……真的吗！呜哇哇——我太喜欢了，谢谢你
！
